node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #1572 宗個案患者的女兒及第 #1588 宗個案患者的妹妹，過往健康良好，無外遊記錄。最後上課日為 7 月 10 日，7 月 13日開始發燒、喉嚨痛、腹瀉及頭痛。
node.detail_en: The patient is the daughter of patient #1572 and younger sister of #1588, with good past health and no travel history. She last attended school on July 10, and developed fever, sore throat, diarrhea, and headache on July 13.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_en: The cluster involves staff members and customers of the Windsor, 5/F Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre.
